page.title: 02INTERVIEW WITH RESIDENT 1.
page.content: A third year pupil interviewed Mrs. Owen who had lived in Welton most of her life.########################### When you came to Welton at the age of 21 what sort of entertainment was there? There were many dances in the Primary School,this was the only place for everything. I also went to Whist Drives and played tennis. What jobs were available in Welton? Not many, mainly work on the land, I spent two years working on a farm, then owing to the Second World War I had to go to Lincoln to work in a factory making hinges for ammunition boxes. How has life changed for you? Oh, I enjoy it much more now,it's just like one big holiday. I don't have to work and all my spare time is taken up helping to run organizations in Welton
